segments.text: Thank you so much for interviewing me this evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Happy to meet with you . Now , do you prefer group projects ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like to work alone on some things and then bring those things to the group .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you value a steady job more or one that offers a chance to move ahead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to grow in my job and move ahead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you work for us in another state , if need be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to stay in the area because of my family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much do you need to make per year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yikes ! Thanks for your interest in this job . We â€™ ll be getting back to you .
segments.speaker: S2
